WorkflowTask.name: WorkflowTask
WorkflowTask.description: Represents a workflow task that is used to fire off a specific workflow action when the specified criteria is met. Includes access to the associated WorkflowRule object in Salesforce Metadata API.

EntityDefinition.description: Required. The entity definition for the object associated with the validation rule.

EntityDefinitionId.description: The ID of the entity containing the workflow task.

FullName.description: The full name of the associated metadata object in Metadata API.

ManageableState.description: Indicates the manageable state of the specified component that is contained in a package: beta deleted deprecated deprecatedEditable installed installedEditable released unmanaged

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace of the package containing the workflow task object.

Priority.description: The task’s priority. Values are: High Normal Low

Status.description: The task’s status. Values are: Not Started In Progress Completed Waiting on someone else Deferred

Subject.description: A subject for the workflow task. It is used if an email notification is sent when the task is assigned.
